hook.text: How do you price something that has no earnings, no cash flow, and no physical form? NFT valuation is pure vibes.

climax.text: NFT valuation remains more art than science. Price discovery in a market of unique items is inherently messy.

punchline.text: An NFT is worth what the next buyer will pay. Nothing more.

quiz.question: What is 'floor price' in NFTs?
